doc.name: productRequestError
doc.summary: Sent when a request for product details fails.

example.p: answer "Error:" && pError && "when requesting details for" && pProduct

description.overview: Handle the productRequestError message if you want to perform an action when a request for product details fails.

parameter.name: product
parameter.description: The identifier of the product for which you wish to retrieve the details.

parameter.name: error
parameter.description: The description of the error that occurred.

description.comments: The productRequestError message is sent to an application when a request for product details, made using the iphoneRequestProductDetails command, fails.
